dict.string: VCON?
Is Ray hinting that perhaps it's Vicki's turn next year?
Little and Large
Brian and Matt meet for the very first time.
Shiny Happy People
There are so many happy people at RWDevCon - it's amazing.
Need More Lanyards
The moment it all became very real. The conference really was happening!
Thank You Sponsors
Without you we wouldn't have been able to put on this amazing conference.
TUTORIAL TEAM ASSEMBLE!
The Avengers certainly have nothing on this lot!
But, But, Delegates
"Matthijs, stop going on about architecture, we're trying to eat!"
Lunch
Mic and Greg grab a quick bite to eat between WatchKit sessions.
One More Thing...
The attendees eaglery awaiting the final big announcement.
Milan Beckoning Marin
Check out Marin's new catalogue pose!
Shiver Me Timbers!
Meet Christine, the world's least terrifying pirate.
We're Jammin'
An impromptu ukulele jamming session in the bar with Tim and Tammy.
Busted!
That's right Saul, we caught you napping.
